name: Watch How I Soar
text:
**Choose one ‚Äî**
- Place yourself into a space at maximum range.
- Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

name: Swoop In
text: Place yourself into a space in radius adjacent to two or more enemy units; if you do, you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Challenge Accepted
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
**This turn:** Gain +2 üõ°Ô∏è Defense.

name: Matter of Honor
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
**This turn:** Gain +3 üõ°Ô∏è Defense.

name: Power Shot
text: Target a unit in range. After the attack: If the target was at maximum range, you may move it 1 space, to a space farther away from you.

name: Thunder Shot
text: Target a unit in range. After the attack: If the target is not adjacent to you, you may move it 1 space, to a space farther away from you.

name: Worthy Opponent
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
**This turn:** Gain +5 üõ°Ô∏è Defense.

name: Sudden Breeze
text: Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line, ignoring obstacles; you may place an enemy unit you moved through into a space adjacent to you.

name: Gust of Wind
text: Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line, ignoring obstacles; you may place an enemy unit you moved through into a space adjacent to you.

name: Crushing Squall
text: Move up to 5 spaces in a straight line, ignoring obstacles; you may place an enemy unit you moved through into a space adjacent to you.

name: Death from Above
text: Move up to 5 spaces in a straight line, ignoring obstacles; an enemy hero you moved through discards a card, if able.

name: Focus
text: **Next turn:** Before you perform a primary action, you may move 1 space.

name: Dash and Slash
text: Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line, ignoring obstacles; an enemy hero you moved through discards a card, if able.

name: Discipline
text: **Next turn:** Before you perform a primary action, move up to 2 spaces.

name: Living Tornado
text: Swap two units at maximum radius.

name: Mastery
text: **Next turn:** Before you perform a primary action, move up to 3 spaces.

name: Storm Spirit
text: Swap two units in radius and at equal distance from you.

name: Power Overwhelming
text: Whenever you choose one, you may choose two different options instead, in any order. Each time after you place yourself, an enemy hero adjacent to you discards a card, if able.

name: Leaf on the Wind
text: Place yourself into a space at maximum range.
